overview: Hilda Walsh has a small city in her basement. Her husband, Ivor, left behind a model replica of the 1950s Boston transit system in their Toronto home, after spending 20 years building it from scratch. Now what is she to do with his miniature masterpiece?  A document of marriage, friendship and a nearly extinct hobby, this short film celebrates one manâ€™s unseen legacy, taking us down the tiny tracks he left behind.
title: Tiny Tracks
